{{Wireless embedded system |brand=BT |model=Home Hub |revision=5B |serialnum_prefix=076286 |upc= |ean= |asin=B00VP3K9U2;GB; |price= |est_release_date=10/2014 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Arcadyan |manuf_model=VR9517M |manuf_rev=AC33 |availability=common |type=CPE, wireless router, dsl modem |fcc_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM63168 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Zentel |fla1_model=A5U1GA31ATS-BC |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B1G1646G-BCH9 |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM63168 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4360;BCM4360KMLG; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=PCB on-board |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags=VDSL2 |stock_boot= |stock_os=Linux;2.6; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=BTHub5-XXXX |default_ssid_regex=^BTHub5-[A-Z0-9]{4}$ |default_ip=192.168.1.254 |default_user=admin |default_pass=''randomly generated'' |oui=4C:09:D4,5C:DC:96, |oui_eth=4C:09:D4,5C:DC:96, }} {{TagLine|BT Business Hub 5 (Type B)}} :{{SupportPage|http://bt.custhelp.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/46549/c/}} * [http://www.shop.bt.com/products/bt-home-hub-5-90RY.html On the '''BT Shop'''] * [http://bt.custhelp.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/35298/~/bt-home-hub%2C-bt-voyager-and-connected-devices-gpl-code ''GPL Code'' for the ''Home Hub 5''] * {{WPLink|BT Home Hub}} [[BT Home Hub]] *'''BT Home Hub 5 (Type A)''' - CPU: [[Lantiq]] PSB 80910 (XWAY VRX268) *'''BT Home Hub 5 (Type B)''' - CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM63168 @400MHz (BCM63268?) ===Power consumption=== 
Model		BT Home Hub 5A	BT Home Hub 5B
In operation		9.2W		14.0W
Idle			6.3W		7.2W
Standby mode		0.2W		0.1W
===See also=== *[[BT Business Hub 5]] Mfr#: 076399 *[[BT Mini Hub Kit]] Mfr#: 086022 *[[BT Smart Hub]] Mfr#: 088138 :2.4GHz: 802.11b/g/n 3x3 MIMO :5GHz: 802.11an/ac 4x4 MIMO :ADSL2+ and VDSL2 ===Images=== File:HomeHub 5B inside.jpeg|Inside the HomeHub 5B File:HomeHub_5B_heatsink_removed.jpeg|With the heatsink removed File:HomeHub_5B_probable_UART.jpeg|Suspected UART port File:HomeHub_5B_SoC.jpeg|BCM63168 chip [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
